snippet: JayVaughn Pinkston scored 20 points to help host Villanova beat a top-five team for the third time this season with a 67-57 victory over No. 5 Georgetown.
abstract: Villanova women's basketball team beats Georgetown, 67-57; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: JayVaughn Pinkston scored 20 points to help host Villanova beat a top-five team for the third time this season with a 67-57 victory over No. 5 Georgetown.
